description: This file contains the SQL schema for the Robot Framework Test Manager project, including table definitions, functions, triggers, and enums for managing users, roles, test scripts, test cases, versioning, execution queue, run history, artifacts, audit logs, and configurations in a PostgreSQL database.

methods.name: set_updated_at
methods.description: A helper function that updates the 'updated_at' timestamp to the current time before any update on tables with this trigger.
